## Project: Three.js Cube Planet with React + Vite + TypeScript

### Technology Stack
- React 18+ with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- Three.js for 3D graphics
- Vitest for testing
- Vercel for deployment

### Project Structure
- `/src` - Source code
- `/src/components` - React components
- `/src/three` - Three.js scene setup
- `/tests` - Test files

### Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow React best practices with functional components
- Use Three.js for rendering a cube-shaped planet
- Write tests with Vitest
- Ensure Vercel deployment compatibility
